apps.name: City Population Data
apps.description: An app that will show you the population of a city based in the spesific years. You can also search for a country and it will show you a list of cities you can use to see the population of the city.

games.name: Tic Tac Toe
games.description: A simple Tic Tac Toe game where you can play together with your friends! It's just a normal Tic Tac Toe game basically.

games.name: Chess
games.description: It's a chess where you can play just like normal chess! Nothing special actually, and it's still not done yet.
